GET /.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the news-round api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by any property in the article object and/or ordered in ascending or descending order. Can also filter by topic

articles.title: The Notorious MSG’s Unlikely Formula For Success
articles.author: grumpy19
articles.body: The 'umami' craze has turned a much-maligned and misunderstood food additive into an object of obsession for the world’s most innovative chefs. But secret ingredient monosodium glutamate’s biggest secret may be that there was never anything wrong with it at all.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object matching the given article ID
